channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-5603] camel-jpa-binding failed to deploy on EAP
item.description:
Deployment fails with this message in EAP server log:

item.summary: camel-jpa-binding failed to deploy on EAP

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This looks fixed in 073. I can reproduce the issue in 069, but cannot in 073.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
1. mvn clean install
2. start EAP
3. mvn install -Pdeploy
